description: Learn how to make the best creamy garlic prawns with this easy recipe. Ready in 20 minutes, this versatile dish makes for the perfect starter, side or main meal.
name: Creamy Garlic Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add prawns and cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes or until prawns are just cooked through. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with bread.
